Keywords: Deity , Mystical , Ruler
Real Name: Zeus
Special Powers
ROLE TAG: Ally
TARGETING: Hindering
A GOD AMONG GODS: SIDELINE ACTIVE, UNIQUE MODIFIER - Friendly Captains and Sidekicks modify attack +1 when attacking 1+ a characters with the Deity keyword.
SHOCK AND AWE: Penetrating/Psychic Blast. When Zeus hits, each hit character halves their speed until your next turn.
YOU DARE TO STRIKE ME!?!: STOP. // Impervious. Each time this click is revealed, after resolutions knock back each opposing character within range 2 squares.

June 1, 2021
Organous
Just played a Mystical team with this, BTAS Zatanna, and RE Raven. I feel so dirty, using Zeus with two magical girls. In the outside-DC lore of Greek mythology, he is commonly targeting innocent women for his pleasure. *cough* And then Hera gets upset at both Zeus and his victims. It was quite effective, though. Zatanna making enhancement bats and pulling the good-old yo-yo trick with Zeus. Raven provided a little extra Perplex and some healing if needed. Very basic, very effective.

Organous
I recall this being discussed during Avengers Infinity, but it was a specific issue, not a general ruling. Taken from the Golden Age Errata & Clarifications thread: [quote][b][u]G023 Eternity[/u][/b] [C]The speed powers on click #'s 11, 12, 13, 14, 15, & 16 on the character card are incorrect. The dial has the correct speed powers.[/quote] EDIT: This has since been corrected. The card has the appropriate cost, so HCRealms is fine here.
